value.title: Strange case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
value.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
value.description: Set in the backdrop later Victorian London, this book can be told as belonging to the category of science fiction, psychological thriller and suspense thriller. Dr Jekyll, a famous and notable scientist seems to be somehow linked with Mr Hyde, a most-wanted criminal. Mr Utterson, a good renown lawyer of the period as well as Jekyll's good friend, tries connecting the dots to find out the truth, a most-shocking truth.
value.subtitle: And Other Dark Tales
